summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 38th Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, between East Blaine Street and East Howe Street, by grading the same all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 30798 of the records of the city comptroller of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
